appSavedSuggestions: The app is saved, so you can test it out by launching the app, or you can exit the editor now.
appSaveErr: Unable to save app. Please try again.
confirmDeleteGroupText: Removing this section will also remove all App parameters defined in it. This action cannot be undone.
doNotPass: Do not pass this argument to command line.
editingPublicApp: You are editing a public app
editPublicAppHelp: Only labels, help text, info text, and other items that are not passed to the command line may be changed. This limitation is to maintain the reproducibility of results from your app. Only the author may edit their own public app.
excludeWhenEmpty: Exclude this item if nothing is entered.
fileInfoTypeLabel: Type of information contained in this file
folderInfoTypeLabel: Type of information contained in this folder
formHasErrors: One or more steps has an error that must be addressed before the app can be saved.
formNotSaved: You have unsaved changes. If you navigate away from the app editor, your unsaved changes will be lost.
isVisible: Display this item in the app.
multiFileInfoTypeLabel: Type of information contained in these files
noToolWarning: The app will not be able to run since a tool has not been selected.
publicAppEditingNotSupported: Editing of Public Apps is not yet supported.
selectParameterDialogSubtitle: Tap the blue icon to the right of each item to display more information about that parameter type.
validationRuleCharacterLimit: Value must contain, at most, a maximum number of characters
validationRuleValueRange: Has a range of allowed values
